misc: His usual shot shape could be described as a "power draw".
biography: Jussi, a familiar face at the Hector Trophée, is a golfer known for his dedicated approach to the game and his powerful draw.

Representing St. Laurence Golf, Jussi brings a level of intensity to the competition that is hard to match. He has participated in the Hector Trophée four times, each time demonstrating a commitment to improvement and a keen understanding of the course's challenges.

Although the coveted Hector Trophée and the Victor Trophy have eluded him so far, Jussi's consistent presence underscores his passion for the sport and the unique camaraderie of the event. While he is not expected to participate in Hector Trophée 2025, fans are always eager for a possible comeback.
